body.name: OBSBOT Meet AI-Powered 4K Webcam, AI Framing & Autofocus, Webcam with Microphone, Background Bokeh, 60 FPS, HDR Low-Light Correction, Beauty Mode, Webcam for PC, Streaming, Conference, Gaming, etc.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 19 hrs 16 mins
Or fastest pickup Thursday, February 15. Order within 20 hrs 31 mins
features: 【AI Framing and Auto Focus】 Our 4K webcam with advanced AI Framing function will tracks your movements with precision and creates seamless zoom transitions. The intelligent Auto Focus ensures your face is always in focus, no matter where you are in the room.

【4K High Definition Streaming】 With 4K resolution, our webcam delivers stunningly lifelike visuals that capture every detail. Whether you want to present a professional image or simply look your best, our web cam has got you covered.【Group Mode Support】

【Effortless Background Blur and Replacement】 Say goodbye to distracting backgrounds with our one-click background blur feature. If you prefer, roll out your virtual background with ease and make your video conference look professional.

【HDR Auto Light Correction】Our webcam for PC ensures that you always look your best, thanks to HDR auto light correction. This feature provides perfect brightness and contrast in any lighting condition, so you always look sharp and clear on web camera.

【Apps for Novice and Experience】Simple plug and play to use our streaming camera, no need to download APP, friendly to newcomers.Meanwhile, the APP function of Beauty Mode, Background Bokeh, OSC and other functions can also make the experienced player have a better experience.
🚩Due to its powerful performance, MEET 4K webcam may get hot during use, this phenomenon is normal and will not damage any function of the camera, please feel free to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is a great camera for a cleaner desk setup
reviews.reviewText: The camera, quality and features it is outstanding. You can have it mounted on top of your monitor or it has its own thread so you can put it on top of a tripod. Great to add better quality picture to your online calls. Mic works great and has its own included cover for when you do not want to have it used.My only concern is that it does get a bit warm/hot while plugged in but so far has not caused any issues. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, a webcam that gets it.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great webcam. It's got good quality video, it's easy to setup, and most importantly it doesn't hide any settings from you.Tell me, what's easier?...Setting the zoom to hide any clutter you have in your room, or cleaning up the clutter?Setting the white balance, or repainting your room so the camera doesn't get confused?Setting the camera's iso, or setting up studio lights?Most other cameras hide these important settings from you because they don't want to "confuse" you. But what they're really doing is forcing you to adjust -to the camera-. But not the Obsbot Meet, it gives you all the settings you need to adjust the camera -to you-.There are, however, a few minor drawbacks:1- The camera gets warm, even while in "sleep" mode. This means it's drawing a bit of power.2- The microphone isn't the best, but it's not the worst either.3- When I first plugged it in, it took 20 minutes to update the firmware4- It uses a USB 2 connection. Meaning, all your video will be compressed, and there is an ever so slight delay. Still, it doesn't look bad.5- I couldn't get the auto-tracking working. It just zoomed out to maximum.When I got it, I thought I'd use the HDR mode, but then didn't. If you don't want to go through careful setup HDR does make it a little easier, but if you play with it a little, you'll get better results without it, meaning the HDR probably isn't the best (but it's not bad).I don't know much about photography, but the interface made it easier enough to figure everything out.I find it a little ironic that OBS is a program most streamers use, called "Open Broadcast Software." It's used crop, tweak, and color correct. But this "OBS"-bot camera includes enough of that on it's own so that you don't have to use OBS.It's smaller than I expected. I'm guessing it's only as big as it needs to be. I like the look of it a lot. Stylish without drawing attention to itself. And the attachable privacy flap is great, since you don't have to worry about losing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, high quality
reviews.reviewText: No issues with the cam other than it can sit weird on top of a monitor. Tripod recommended. Solid quality and functions well with streamlabs OBS

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the best bang for you buck!!!
reviews.reviewText: Outstanding picture quality, streams smoothly and lots of cool features. Rock solid contruction and well engineered lens cover. The only non-issue I can mention is it runs hot but it's normal for this webcam. I have not experienced any issues over the year I have been using it. I like this webcam so much I'm buying a second one!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks good but flickers with OBS
reviews.reviewText: It can look great but can’t comfortably do 4K without flickering. Easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Now this … is a camera.
reviews.reviewText: With a public speaking opportunity coming up, I wanted to improve my webcam game. I found myself testing a lot of different cameras out—2K quality, 4K quality—and after a lot of looking, I finally found my camera. What really puts this over the edge are the bevy of options available, as well as the software quality. Being able to adjust zoom angle—sort of an Achilles’ heel of other 4K cameras—was not a problem with the OBSBOT.Obviously this is not to the level of, say, a DSLR, but it is well above many other cameras of its type. One major thing that helps it a lot is the quality of the software (which is, yes, available for Mac). You can tweak more granular things like ISO with this camera, as well as being able to zoom at a variety of angles. I tend to prefer a tighter angle, which this excels at.If I had to make one recommendation to OBSBOT around this camera—make the stand more rigid. It should not move when I’m simply trying to adjust the camera, and because it does it makes it harder to maintain the same position. (On the plus side, the pan/tilt/zoom functions of the camera help with this.)I will say that you’re on your own for lighting with this one so be sure to get a ring light or something of similar quality. But I think that if you’re doing a lot of Zoom calls, this will go a long way to updating any desktop setup.Spend the extra money and get something good. I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 1 year
reviews.reviewText: The product worked fine for the first year but now the video is a black screen and the firmware upgrade fails every time. The only product support they have is an email address. I guess I'm back on the market for a webcam.

reviews.reviewTitle: Clear video and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Had this for almost a week but love it so far! Does everything I need plus more. Picture quality is great, setup is easy, and AI tracking works very well. Definitely recommend

muy buen producto solo me gustaria que en general el sistema fuese mas intituivo y o automático en algunos casos. y no tenerlo que hacer siempre de forma manual. me hubiera gustado que incluyera un tripié.

In einer Zeit, in der Videokonferenzen und Online-Meetings zu einem wesentlichen Bestandteil unseres beruflichen und persönlichen Lebens geworden sind, habe ich die OBSBOT Meet KI-Gesteuerte Webcam 1080P 60 fps getestet und bin einfach nur beeindruckt von ihrer Leistung und den erweiterten Funktionen.Videoqualität:Die Videoqualität dieser Webcam ist herausragend. Mit einer Auflösung von 1080p und flüssigen 60 Bildern pro Sekunde liefert sie gestochen scharfe und lebendige Bilder. Egal, ob in einem wichtigen Geschäftstreffen oder einem Videoanruf mit Freunden und Familie, diese Webcam stellt sicher, dass Sie immer in bester Qualität erscheinen.KI-Verfolgung:Das Highlight dieser Webcam ist zweifellos die KI-Verfolgungstechnologie. Sie erkennt automatisch Ihr Gesicht und verfolgt Ihre Bewegungen, selbst wenn Sie sich im Raum bewegen. Das bedeutet, dass Sie nicht mehr ständig in die Kamera starren müssen, um im Bild zu bleiben. Die KI hält Sie immer zentriert und scharf im Fokus, was Ihre Präsentationen und Videokonferenzen auf ein neues Niveau hebt.Rauschunterdrückung:Die OBSBOT Meet verfügt über eine erstaunliche Rauschunterdrückungsfunktion, die Hintergrundgeräusche minimiert und sicherstellt, dass Ihre Stimme klar und deutlich übertragen wird. Selbst in lauten Umgebungen werden Ihre Gespräche und Präsentationen von kristallklarer Qualität sein.Einfache Einrichtung:Die Einrichtung der Webcam ist denkbar einfach. Sie wird einfach per USB an Ihren Computer angeschlossen und ist sofort einsatzbereit. Die mitgelieferte Software ermöglicht es Ihnen, die Verfolgungseinstellungen anzupassen und die Kamera nach Ihren Bedürfnissen zu konfigurieren.Haltbarkeit und Verarbeitung:Die OBSBOT Meet ist solide gebaut und fühlt sich langlebig an. Sie wird mit einem praktischen Stativ geliefert, das eine einfache Positionierung ermöglicht, und ist sowohl für Laptops als auch für Desktop-Computer geeignet.Fazit:Die OBSBOT Meet KI-Gesteuerte Webcam 1080P 60 fps ist ein absoluter Gamechanger für Videokonferenzen und Online-Meetings. Ihre herausragende Videoqualität, KI-Verfolgung, Rauschunterdrückung und einfache Einrichtung machen sie zu einem unschätzbaren Werkzeug für Geschäftsanwender, Lehrer und alle, die viel Zeit vor der Kamera verbringen. Die Webcam ist nicht nur funktional, sondern auch äußerst benutzerfreundlich und langlebig. Wenn Sie nach einem Upgrade für Ihre Videokonferenz-Erfahrung suchen, ist die OBSBOT Meet die perfekte Wahl. Ich kann sie uneingeschränkt empfehlen und bin überzeugt, dass sie Ihre Erwartungen übertreffen wird.

Support très pratique: magnétique, donc pas de vis à serrer, très facile à orienter et à placer. Conception astucieuse qui s'adapte à tous les écrans. Seul le petit rebord de la face avant dépassera un peu sur l'écran des moniteurs récents à bords fins, comme sur mon MSI par exemple.La caméra est lourde, car en métal en partie, pour se fixer au support.Le logiciel est bien fait, même si sur ma machine, il plante la première fois qu'on le lance et qu'on allume la caméra. Il faut le relancer, et là, plus de problème! Curieux, mais cela fonctionne ensuite. Espérons qu'une mise à jour corrigera cela plus tard.Les filtres sont là pour les accros de TikTok, Youtube et autres instagram, qui seront ravis de montrer leur faux visage au monde entier. Personnellement, je trouve cela trop artificiel, donc mon visage avec ses défauts, c'est parfait. Ceux qui ne sont pas contents de cela, eh bien, tant pis! 😁Le cadrage automatique sur votre beau visage fonctionne très bien, et vous serez toujours sur l'image, jusqu'à un certain point, bien entendu!La led blanche indique que la caméra est active, le blanc clignotant, qu'elle est en cours d'activation, le jaune clignotant, que la mise à jour est en cours, le rouge clignotant, que la mise à jours a échoué.Les 2 micros sur les côtés sont assez sensibles, et captent très bien les sons. La fonction atténuation du bruit semble fonctionner correctement, même si ce ne sera jamais parfait.Le bouton du dessus permet entre autre de mettre la caméra en veille en appuyant 3 secondes dessus. Un clic permet d'activer le floutage du fond, derrière vous, et cela fonctionne assez bien, je dois l'avouer. Le niveau de floutage est réglable dans l'application OBSBOT à télécharger.Bref, une bonne caméra en 1080p, qui n'a rien à envier aux autres marques plus connues et plus chères également, notamment une certaine marque suisse très connue pour ses périphériques.Le seul bémol pour moi, elle a tendance à chauffer, car toute fermée, sans ouvertures d'aération, ce qui semble être la mode. Le design, c'est important, mais la durée dans le temps aussi. Ce sera un point à voir sur la durée.Les vidéo en 1080p 30FPS produisent, avec le logiciel de la caméra, des .mkv d'environ 16 mbps, et en 60 FPS, à peu près le double. La qualité est donc tout à fait acceptable.

El soporte es raro, magnetico pero como la tengo estatica no hay problema, la calidad es mas que decente en 1080p y si es verdad que se calienta pero no merma el rendimiento ni baja de fps la uso para grabar a 1080p@60FPS durante varias horas seguidas y sin problemas.
